title.en: College of Information and Computing Sciences Orientation
title.fil: Orientation ng College of Information and Computing Sciences

description.en: Welcome new students to CICS with an introduction to programs, faculty, and campus resources.
description.fil: Pagtanggap sa mga bagong estudyante sa CICS kasama ang pagpapakilala sa mga programa, faculty, at campus resources.

sampleEvents.organizer: College of Information and Computing Sciences

description.en: University-wide mid-term examinations for all undergraduate and graduate programs.
description.fil: Pandaigdigang mid-term examinations para sa lahat ng undergraduate at graduate programs.

title.fil: Pagdiriwang ng Foundation Day ng MARSU

description.en: Annual celebration of MARSU's founding with cultural performances, academic competitions, and community activities.
description.fil: Taunang pagdiriwang ng pagkakatatag ng MARSU kasama ang mga cultural performance, academic competition, at community activities.

description.en: Annual research symposium showcasing faculty and student research projects across all colleges.
description.fil: Taunang research symposium na nagtatampok ng mga research project ng faculty at estudyante sa lahat ng kolehiyo.

description.en: Last day for late enrollment and payment of tuition fees for the current semester.
description.fil: Huling araw para sa late enrollment at bayad ng tuition fees para sa kasalukuyang semester.

description.en: Inter-college sports competition featuring basketball, volleyball, track and field, and other sporting events.
description.fil: Inter-college sports competition na may basketball, volleyball, track and field, at iba pang sporting events.

description.en: Commencement exercises for graduating students from all colleges and programs.
description.fil: Commencement exercises para sa mga graduating students mula sa lahat ng kolehiyo at programa.

description.en: Week-long activities promoting reading, research skills, and library resources utilization.
description.fil: Lingguhang aktibidad na nagpo-promote ng pagbabasa, research skills, at paggamit ng library resources.
